content: if you are as obsessed with the bobble stitch as i am then you are going to absolutely love this wall hanging pattern with its diamond shape and fringe this would be the perfect modern boho decor piece to hang in your home perfect for decorating small spaces skill level intermediate materials weight 4 / worsted weight yarn 4 50 mm crochet hook please note instructions come with an easy to read easy to understand pattern and are written in u s terminology thank you so much for stopping by my ravelry shop i am continuing to work on fun and exciting designs the content of this pattern details and photos are property of love & stitch yarn designs distribution copying or sharing of this pattern is not permissible please feel free to use this pattern to create and sell only with credentials of pattern used given to love & stitch yarn designs i d absolutely love to see your product photos please tag or link your items with @loveandstitchh on instagram
